data.title: Beautiful Historic Walking Tour
data.text: We had a fabulous walking tour with Joyce, not only is she a total historian she is also an excellent photographer and gives many pointers along the way about capturing and framing the best photographs of Charleston.

owner_response.author: PicturePerfectWalks, Owner at Charleston History Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you kindly for your appreciation of my walking tour!
Hope to see you on your next visit.
Thanks again, Joyce Weir
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great tour
data.text: Joyce was an amazing guide. We learned so much about the history and local life in Charleston, and got some amazing pictures. Also Joyce had some great guidance about the rest of our trip in South Carolina.

data.title: Amazing Charleston Walking Tour
data.text: Would highly, highly recommend this walking tour. Joyce was knowledgeable and a great story teller - learned so much about Charleston. She was also helpful and we learned a lot about how take photos. Wonderful way to see Charleston and spend a morning or afternoon.

owner_response.author: PicturePerfectWalks, Owner at Charleston History Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you so much for your kind review.
I look forward to touring with you on your next Charleston Visit!
Thanks again,
Joyce Weir
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: bucket list
data.text: Charleston was so pretty, an so glad we did this. Tour guide very good on the history of the town. Seeing is from that point of view gave it more insight of the old town.

owner_response.author: PicturePerfectWalks, Owner at Charleston History Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
So glad you have suggested this tour for a "Bucket List!"
I hope this inspires others to walk Charleston too!

Thank you for your kind review.
Joyce Weir
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Joyce was outstanding !
data.text: Just completed a 2 1/2 hour your of historical Charleston.  She was a wonderful and knowledgeable guide who loves this city.  Filled with historical facts and photo tips, we highly recommend her.

owner_response.author: PicturePerfectWalks, Owner at Charleston History Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
I so enjoyed our time together
I learned form you too!
Please visit again and we can explore another route!

Thank you,
Joyce Weir
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Picture Perfect!
data.text:
Joyce was wonderful! Very knowledgable not only in photography but the history of Charleston as well considering she is a transplant from the North! 
We happened to book on a holiday Monday and were the only two on the tour she brought along her dog Bailey which was an absolute delight as I work in a pet store and am an avid animal lover. It was so great to share Charleston with her and Bailey! 
We walked a a very reasonable pace for two hours stopping for photo ops/lessons and history lessons along the way. 
No cheesy selling gimmicks like other tours I have been on, just pure straight knowledge and fun! 

I look forward to hopefully being able to plan a custom tour with Joyce on my next visit!

Definitely recommend Joyce on your visit to Charleston and try to book early in your stay so you can use the photography tips and history for the remainder of your visit!

data.title: A wonderful tour
data.text: It was such a good tour.  The driver was so knowledgeable and so full of fun as he explained the sights to us all.  I can highly recommend this to anyone who wishes to learn the history of charleston

data.title: My favorite photo tour
data.text: Of all the history and photo tours I have taken part in, this was the best. Joyce is a fun, knowledgeable guide. Not only does she possess a wealth of historic information, she has a photographer's eye and shares her artistic ideas with you. Your photography will be improved after one tour with Joyce.  She's great!  The area you tour contains so much hidden history that you would miss it without her guidance. This is my favorite walking tour and I would do it again!

data.title: Awesome & Unique Tour of Charleston
data.text: Joyce was delightful; not only does she have a thorough knowledge of Charleston's history but with her friendly nature and witty personality, the tour seemed to fly by. Joyce's love of Charleston was obvious and her tour has you falling for this city too. With her photography tips, we have many wonderful postcard-perfect pictures. I would definitely recommend this tour with Joyce of this charming city.

data.title: Great time!
data.text: Joyce was amazing! Extremely knowledgeable about Charleston & photography. I bought this as a birthday gift for my girlfriend and it was amazing. I highly recommend this for photography lovers on any level.

data.title: Wonderful & unique history tour of Charleston!
data.text: We were able to squeeze this tour in on our long trek from Florida to DC.  We chose this specific tour because Joyce added a photographer's viewpoint as well as historical information.  We were so happy and thoroughly enjoyed the tour with Joyce!   She offered us a fact filled tour and showed us several unique ways of documenting our walk photographically.   Our four tweens loved this trek too.   We would HIGHLY recommend taking this tour with Joyce!  She is a fantastic guide and true treasure in Charleston!

data.title: Charleston history tour
data.text: Differently worth the price! This tour starts in Myrtle Beach where a bus picks you up at an assign point and transports to Charleston. There you will have a carriage ride through downtown Historical Charleston with a knowledgeable tour guide. After the carriage ride you can experience the Charleston City Market to shop. Next you are transported by bus to the Carolina Belle for a Harbor Tour and a box lunch. Your next stop by bus is the Boone Hall Plantation tour, one of America's oldest working and living plantation. Bus brings you back to Myrtle Beach. Whole trip around 10.5 hrs. A real taste for Charleston culture and architect is experienced.

data.title: Great Walking Tour
data.text: Joyce was fun to be with, very informative and gave us excellent tips for getting the best photos on our walking tour.

data.title: Loads of Information and Tons of great Photo Ops
data.text: Joyce was awesome!  We were a group of 7 photographers and where thrilled with the combination of historical information about the city we were visiting as well as as all the tips and time allowed for taking photographs.  Thank you!

data.title: Charleston History Bus Tour
data.text: What a great tour.  We were able to see many of the homes in downtown Charleston and hear about the history of them without worrying about traffic.  We also saw some of the old courthouses learned about their history.  If you can I highly recommend a bus/carriage tour and a walking tour to get the best of both.

data.title: Great walking tour
data.text: Although my husband and I arrived in Charleston 2 days ago and had already ridden around this small town, we decided to take a walking tour to learn more about the landmarks. What a delight Joyce was! Her wealth of information covered not just historic landmarks, but also culture, architecture, and social color that helped to make the 2 hours fly by. Her delivery is fun to listen to and well paced. We highly recommend this tour!

data.title: Terrific Tour of Charlrston
data.text: Joyce was very knowledgable about the history of Charleston and the architecture. This was a great afternoon thank you Joyce so much.

data.title: Joyce is such a wealth of historical information and lots of fun!
data.text: Joyce is so knowledgeable about the History of Charleston, Revolutionary and Civil War eras!  I learned so much from her and so enjoyed her walking tour of this beautiful city.  She is a wealth of information, extremely energetic and gives wonderful tips for photography!  A terrific and very worthwhile tour!

data.title: Joyce is a walking Charleston encyclopedia
data.text: Joyce deserves 6 stars!  In two hours we were oriented the historic city, learned its history, architecture, and folklore.  And along the way Joyce provided a few excellent tips on taking better pictures.  She transmits her exuberant love of her adopted city as you stroll along the streets of historic Charleston.  She knows every house, every plant and tree, and more than enough historic details to make for a perfect tour.

data.title: Great walking photo tour
data.text: This is our 3rd time in the past 5 years to take a walking photo tour with Joyce. It is a great way to learn some of the history of the "oh so charming" Charleston while getting some great photo ops!  Joyce not only show us the great things to photograph, but how to take the best photo of it!
